item.title: Rivals Pounce on Paul Weiss, a Top Law Firm, After Trump’s Order
item.description: Fears that competitors could take its top rainmaking talent added to the law firm’s worries about a Trump executive order that targeted it.

item.title: U.S. to End Vaccine Funds for Poor Countries
item.description: A 281-page spreadsheet obtained by The Times lists the Trump administration’s plans for thousands of foreign aid programs.

item.title: Trump Signs Executive Order Targeting New Law Firm, Jenner & Block
item.description: An executive order underscored the extent to which the president, who faced four indictments after he left office, aims to exact a price from anyone a...

item.title: Dollar Tree Is Selling Family Dollar for $1 Billion
item.description: Nearly 10 years after buying Family Dollar for about $9 billion, Dollar Tree announced it would sell the retailer to two private equity firms.

item.title: Supreme Court Upholds Biden Administration’s Limits on ‘Ghost Guns’
item.description: The administration had tightened regulations on kits that can be easily assembled into nearly untraceable firearms.
